entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
